title: BRIEF-TopBuild Receives Early Termination Of Hart-Scott-Rodino Waiting Period For USI Acquisition
text:
April 16, 2018 / 8:17 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-TopBuild Receives Early Termination Of Hart-Scott-Rodino Waiting Period For USI Acquisition Reuters Staff 
April 16 (Reuters) - TopBuild Corp: 
* TOPBUILD RECEIVES EARLY TERMINATION OF HART-SCOTT-RODINO WAITING PERIOD FOR USI ACQUISITION 
* TOPBUILD CORP - CO CURRENTLY PLANS TO COMPLETE ACQUISITION ON MAY 1, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
